ability.name: All Signs Point to Yes
ability.description: * Place the High Priestess on All Signs Point to Yes * While the High Priestess is on All Signs Point to Yes: * Twos, Threes, Fours, and Nines can be used on Concentrate. * When a Two, Three, Four, or Nine is used on Concentrate, instead of discarding it, place it on All Signs Point to Yes. * Discard the High Priestess from All Signs Point to Yes whenever you like. * When you do, deal 2 Magic Ranged Damage to every Adversary for each card on All Signs Point to Yes, * then discard all cards on All Signs Point to Yes.
ability.flavor: It almost seems like you're in a trance.
